From: NME Accounts <NME-Accounts@nascodubai.com <mailto:NME-Accounts@nascodubai.com> > 
Sent: Sunday, December 29, 2024 2:19 AM
Subject: NME invites you to complete: Important Update Regarding Changes in Beneficiary Account for Premium payment.

 

CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

 

 

 

 



 

You are invited to take this:

chunks.text:
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

 

 

 

 



 

You are invited to take this:

Important Update Regarding Changes in Beneficiary Account for Premium payment. 

 

Dear Valued Client,

We wish to inform you that the Central Bank of the UAE has issued new regulations for Insurance Brokers, dated July 25, 2024. According to these regulations, Insurance Brokers are prohibited from collecting premiums under any circumstances. These regulations will come into effect on February 15, 2025.

In compliance with these regulations, we will cease collecting premiums effective January 1, 2025. Henceforth, all premium payments should be made directly to the insurance providers as per the details mentioned in the insurance policy invoice you receive from the insurance company.

We kindly request that you acknowledge your understanding of this change by submitting your response.

Nasco M.E. Insurance Brokers

General Disclaimer:
This email message including any attachments are confidential to the intended recipient. If you are not the intended recipient, be advised that you have received this e-mail in error and that any use, dissemination, forwarding, printing or copying of this e-mail is strictly prohibited. It may not be disclosed to or used by anyone other than its intended recipient, nor may it be copied in any way. If received in error please email a reply to the sender, and then delete it from your system. Nasco may monitor and record e-mail traffic and data. Nasco accepts no liability for any damage caused by any virus transmitted by this email.

Sanctions Disclaimer:
This quote is subject to sanctions screening and verification by Nasco that there are no sanctions against any party that is covered under this risk and any party related thereto that has an interest regardless of any type of risk.
